item.title: How to change xteletome xteleto playerrights
item.dc:creator: @Jerrad12 Jerrad12
item.description:
@Jerrad12 wrote:

so i went to commands.java if (playerCommand.startsWith(“xteletome”)) {
try {
String playerToTele = playerCommand.substring(10);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToTele)) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + c.playerName);
c2.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel);
break;
}
}
}
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Player Must Be Offline.”);
}
}
and im trying to make it so that mods can use this same command only admins+ can use it. btw this is a 317 thanks

Read full topic
item.source: How to change xteletome xteleto playerrights
